Html:
Hello all;
i'm new to the GMap.Net API , and a part from some tutorials, i'm wondering what kind of stuff can we do with the user control :
  • Zooming in and out ok, but to what bounds ?
  • Bearing is pretty good.
  • can we serialize overlays and deserialize them ?
  • can we search for an address and get the lat/lon position and vice versa ?
it should be a good thing that every one expose some capabilities that others do not even know they exist.

thank you for the good job done here.
